content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 6360.
- ElectricityGroup with id=6360 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (Generator) at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_systems: [22812].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_systems: [22812].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22812 at position(-6.5, 20.5) status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22813 at position(-2.5, 20.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22814 at position(-0.5, 21.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22819 at position(-3.5, 23.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22818 at position(-7.5, 25.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22823 at position(3.5, 25.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22822 at position(2.5, 24.5) status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=22825 at position(-0.5, 28.5) status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Fluid System Connection Failures:
   - Connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [21092, 21135, 21178, 21221, 21264, 21307, 21350, 21393, 21436, 21479, 21522, 21565, 21608, 21651, 21694, 21737, 21780, 21823, 21866, 21909, 21952, 21995, 22038, 22081, 22124, 22167, 22210, 22253, 22296, 22339, 22382, 22425, 22468, 22511, 22554, 22597, 22640, 22683, 22726, 22769] have consistently failed to deliver water to the steam engine. Verify that the designated PipeGroup is operational and correctly configured for the target fluid system.
• Fixed Delay Limitations for Pipeline Stabilization:
   - Relying on a fixed 10-second delay does not guarantee pipeline network stabilization. Implement dynamic readiness checks to ensure stabilization before reattempting connection operations.
